Items.Effect: Draw 2 blueprints and choose to keep 1
Look at one facedown event, resource, or obstacle
Pay 1[^Money] move to any location and ignore all negative effects
If this isn't the first time using this action gain 1 of any resource
Items.Flavor: When you know what the pickup schedule is, it's easy to show up

Items.Effect: One invention can now be resused for the whole day
Lose 2Tags, ignore Lockdown damage, and ignore all hunt events
If this isn't the first time using this action gain 4[^Money]
Items.Flavor: It's not gambling when you already know who is gonna win

Items.Effect: Buy resources for 4[^Money] and sell resources for 2[^Money]
